items.title: CrowdStrike just killed 40 hours of SOC pain: Hereâ€™s how they did it
items.description: CrowdStrike is launching Charlotte AI Detection Triage, saving SOC teams over 40 hours a week and delivering over 98% accuracy.

items.title: Too many models, too much confusion: OpenAI pledges to simplify its product line
items.description: Altman is the rare CEO to admit that the number of models the company released has made their core products more complicated to use.

items.title: Less supervision, better results: Study shows AI models generalize more effectively on their own
items.description: Training LLMs and VLMs through reinforcement learning delivers better results than using hand-crafted examples.

items.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman shares plans to bring o3 Deep Research agent to free and ChatGPT Plus users
items.description: If you're a free ChatGPT user, you best make sure your 2 uses per month of Deep Research are for queries you really want or need answered.

items.title: Qualcomm aims for games with Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 Mobile chips
items.description: Qualcomm is aiming for gaming with the introduction of the Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 Mobile processor platform.
